sourcesContent:
{{category.name}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import {products} from "../products"; export interface category{ name: string; } export const categories = [ { name : 'Phones' }, { name : 'PC' } ] @Component({ selector: 'app-category', templateUrl: './category.component.html', styleUrls: ['./category.component.css'] }) export class CategoryComponent { constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute){ } categories = [...categories] public categoryFromRoute: string; ngOnInit() { // First get the product id from the current route. const routeParams = this.route.snapshot.paramMap; this.categoryFromRoute = String(routeParams.get('category')); // Find the product that correspond with the id provided in route. // products.find(product => product.category === categoryFromRoute); } }
